name: SiteMile Social Icons Widget
author: SiteMile

sections.description:
Social Widget Plugin lets you have a widget that contains all major social network icons. Customisable colours, drag and drop. Easy to use.

Donations

You can donate to us here https://paypal.me/sitemile , also we do customisation work on any themes or plugins outside. Contact us
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire Sitemile Social Widget folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. In your Widgets menu, simply drag the widget labeled “SiteMile Social Widget” into a widget area.
  4. Configure the widget by choosing a title, icon size and color, and the URLs to your various social profiles.
sections.faq:
How can I add an icon?

You can add an icon by editing the main php file of the plugin. Simply tie to the filter, or add the filter code into your functions.php
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Second release, updated the tags.

1.0.0

  • Initial release, tested with latest wp 5.8 and works fine.
